categories: Category:Songs by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes

nodes.text: The Sequential Passage of Chronological Intervals

"The Sequential Passage of Chronological Intervals" was a song performed by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes, an all-Bith band led by the musician Figrin D'an. It was at one time considered number three in the top five greatest hits of the planet Tatooine.

"The Sequential Passage of Chronological Intervals" first appeared in the Star Wars Legends short story Play It Again, Figrin D'an: The Tale of Muftak and Kabe, which was written by A. C. Crispin and published in Tales from the Mos Eisley Cantina, an anthology book released in 1995. The song was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, which was released in 2015.
